title: Service Provider Configuration
description: Schema for representing the service provider's configuration

documentationUri.description: An HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the service provider's human-consumable help documentation.

patch.description: A complex type that specifies PATCH configuration options.

supported.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

bulk.description: A complex type that specifies bulk configuration options.

supported.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

filter.description: A complex type that specifies FILTER options.

supported.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

maxResults.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

changePassword.description: A complex type that specifies configuration options related to changing a password.

supported.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

sort.description: A complex type that specifies sort result options.

supported.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the operation is supported.

authenticationSchemes.description: A complex type that specifies supported authentication scheme properties.

name.description: The common authentication scheme name, e.g., HTTP Basic.

description.description: A description of the authentication scheme.

specUri.description: An HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the authentication scheme's specification.

documentationUri.description: An HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the authentication scheme's usage documentation.
